page.title: 19THE HARLOW ADVICE BUREAU .
page.content: The{Advice Bureau}was built 7 years ago.About{53,000}people are helped every year,with every kind of problem ranging from{Legal to Consumer.} Ten people are employed, one person is paid,the others are volunteers.Often people come in as a last resort ; others come straight away,to find help with their problems.Sometimes people will tell of their problems standing at the desk,some will not say anything and prefer privacy.Once the Advice Centre was visited by a group of skin heads (hooligans) from outside Harlow asking to meet Harlow's skin heads.When they had gone{Mrs Sursbury {(superviser)}saw that the collecting box had gone! Later on one skin head came back to return the money. Much information is published on posters and leaflets for distribution.
